title: Inflation and the Federal Reserve: How the Fed Erred and What's Next?
description: MarketWatch economic reporter Jeffry Bartash talks to former central banker Thomas Hoenig about the Fed's big mistakes and what it can do to fix the inflation problem.
itunes:author: Barron's Live
itunes:summary: MarketWatch economic reporter Jeffry Bartash talks to former central banker Thomas Hoenig about the Fed's big mistakes and what it can do to fix the inflation problem.
